017
018package org.tquadrat.foundation.xml.builder;
019
020import static java.lang.String.format;
021import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.STABLE;
022import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.hash;
023import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireNonNullArgument;
024import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireNotEmptyArgument;
025import static org.tquadrat.foundation.xml.builder.XMLBuilderUtils.getPrefixValidator;
026
027import java.io.Serial;
028import java.io.Serializable;
029import java.net.URI;
030import java.net.URISyntaxException;
031import java.util.Optional;
032
033import org.apiguardian.api.API;
034import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
035import org.tquadrat.foundation.xml.builder.spi.InvalidXMLNameException;
036
037/**
038 *  The definition of an XML namespace entry.
039 *
040 *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
041 *  @version $Id: Namespace.java 1071 2023-09-30 01:49:32Z tquadrat $
042 *  @since 0.0.5
043 *
044 *  @UMLGraph.link
045 */
046@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: Namespace.java 1071 2023-09-30 01:49:32Z tquadrat $" )
047@API( status = STABLE, since = "0.0.5" )
048public final class Namespace implements Serializable, Comparable<Namespace>
049{
050        /*-----------*\
051    ====** Constants **========================================================
052        \*-----------*/
053    /**
054     *  An empty array of {@code Namespace} objects.
055     */
056    public static final Namespace [] EMPTY_Namespace_ARRAY = new Namespace [0];
057
058    /**
059     *  The keyword for a namespace definition: {@value}.
060     */
061    public static final String KEYWORD = "xmlns";
062
063        /*------------*\
064    ====** Attributes **=======================================================
065        \*------------*/
066    /**
067     *  The namespace identifier.
068     */
069    private final URI m_Identifier;
070
071    /**
072     *  The namespace prefix.
073     */
074    @SuppressWarnings( "OptionalUsedAsFieldOrParameterType" )
075    private final Optional<String> m_Prefix;
076
077        /*------------------------*\
078    ====** Static Initialisations **===========================================
079        \*------------------------*/
080    /**
081     *  The serial version UID for objects of this class: {@value}.
082     *
083     *  @hidden
084     */
085    @Serial
086    private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
087
088        /*--------------*\
089    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
090        \*--------------*/
091    /**
092     *  Creates a new {@code Namespace} instance without a prefix.
093     *
094     *  @param  identifier  The namespace identifier.
095     */
096    public Namespace( final URI identifier )
097    {
098        this( Optional.empty(), identifier );
099    }   //  Namespace()
100
101    /**
102     *  Creates a new {@code Namespace} instance without a prefix.
103     *
104     *  @param  identifier  The namespace identifier.
105     *  @throws URISyntaxException  The provided URI String is invalid.
106     */
107    public Namespace( final String identifier ) throws URISyntaxException
108    {
109        this( Optional.empty(), new URI( requireNotEmptyArgument( identifier, "identifier" ) ) );
110    }   //  Namespace()
111
112    /**
113     *  Creates a new {@code Namespace} instance.<br>
114     *  <br>The given prefix is validated using the method that is
115     *  provided by
116     *  {@link org.tquadrat.foundation.xml.builder.XMLBuilderUtils#getPrefixValidator()}.
117     *
118     *  @param  prefix  The namespace prefix.
119     *  @param  identifier  The namespace identifier.
120     */
121    public Namespace( final String prefix, final URI identifier )
122    {
123        this( Optional.of( requireNotEmptyArgument( prefix, "prefix" ) ), identifier );
124    }   //  Namespace()
125
126    /**
127     *  Creates a new {@code Namespace} instance.<br>
128     *  <br>The given prefix is validated using the method that is
129     *  provided by
130     *  {@link org.tquadrat.foundation.xml.builder.XMLBuilderUtils#getPrefixValidator()}.
131     *
132     *  @param  prefix  The namespace prefix.
133     *  @param  identifier  The namespace identifier.
134     *  @throws URISyntaxException  The provided URI String is invalid.
135     */
136    public Namespace( final String prefix, final String identifier ) throws URISyntaxException
137    {
138        this( Optional.of( requireNotEmptyArgument( prefix, "prefix" ) ), new URI( requireNotEmptyArgument( identifier, "identifier" ) ) );
139    }   //  Namespace()
140
141    /**
142     *  Creates a new {@code Namespace} instance.<br>
143     *  <br>The given prefix is validated using the method that is
144     *  provided by
145     *  {@link org.tquadrat.foundation.xml.builder.XMLBuilderUtils#getPrefixValidator()}.
146     *
147     *  @param  prefix  The namespace prefix.
148     *  @param  identifier  The namespace identifier.
149     */
150    @SuppressWarnings( "OptionalUsedAsFieldOrParameterType" )
151    private Namespace( final Optional<String> prefix, final URI identifier )
152    {
153        if( prefix.isPresent() && !getPrefixValidator().test( prefix.get() ) )
154        {
155            throw new InvalidXMLNameException( prefix.get() );
156        }
157
158        m_Prefix = prefix;
159        m_Identifier = requireNonNullArgument( identifier, "identifier" );
160    }   //  Namespace()
161
162        /*---------*\
163    ====** Methods **==========================================================
164        \*---------*/
165    /**
166     *  {@inheritDoc}
167     */
168    @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
169    @Override
170    public final int compareTo( final Namespace o )
171    {
172        final var retValue = m_Prefix.isPresent()
173            ? (o.m_Prefix.isPresent() ? Integer.signum( m_Prefix.orElseThrow().compareTo( o.m_Prefix.orElseThrow() ) ) : 1)
174            : (o.m_Prefix.isPresent() ? -1 : 0);
175
176        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
177        return retValue;
178    }   //  compareTo()
179
180    /**
181     *  {@inheritDoc}
182     */
183    @Override
184    public final boolean equals( final Object obj )
185    {
186        var retValue = this == obj;
187        if( !retValue && obj instanceof final Namespace other )
188        {
189            retValue = m_Prefix.equals( other.m_Prefix ) && m_Identifier.equals( other.m_Identifier );
190        }
191
192        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
193        return retValue;
194    }
195
196    /**
197     *  Returns the namespace identifier.
198     *
199     *  @return The namespace identifier.
200     */
201    public final URI getIdentifier() { return m_Identifier; }
202
203    /**
204     *  Returns the namespace prefix.
205     *
206     *  @return An instance of
207     *      {@link Optional}
208     *      that holds the namespace prefix.
209     */
210    public final Optional<String> getPrefix() { return m_Prefix; }
211
212    /**
213     *  {@inheritDoc}
214     */
215    @Override
216    public final int hashCode() { return hash( m_Prefix, m_Identifier ); }
217
218    /**
219     *  {@inheritDoc}
220     */
221    @Override
222    public final String toString()
223    {
224        final var retValue = m_Prefix
225            .map( p -> format( "%s:%s=\"%s\"", KEYWORD, p, m_Identifier.toString() ) )
226            .orElseGet( () -> format( "%s=\"%s\"", KEYWORD, m_Identifier.toString() ) );
227
228        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
229        return retValue;
230    }   //  toString()
231}
232//  class Namespace
233
234/*
235 *  End of File
236 */
